title: How can grown-ups get to this? Merkel's 'nein' risks calamity for all in chaotic, no-deal Brexit
text:
Should the United Kingdom remain a member of the European Union or leave the European Union? Remain or Leave? It was a simple enough question, but as rapidly became apparent, it was designed only for one answer; Remain.

Leaving on terms that ensure the short to medium run integrity and economic wellbeing of the United Kingdom is proving a political, constitutional, legalistic and diplomatic nightmare. What seemed to be acceptable to the European Union has proved unacceptable to the UK parliament, and what could possibly be acceptable to the UK parliament is now proving unacceptable to Ireland and the EU. A cake and eat it solution was always unrealistic, and so it has proved.

The original sin...
description: Should the United Kingdom remain a member of the European Union or leave the European Union?
